abstract: B L Hunt resigns as asst legal adviser
snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 29--Bert L. Hunt, international lawyer and until his resignation yesterday assistant legal adviser of the State Department, has been commissioned by the Committee of American Importers to go to London and Paris...

headline.main: AMERICAN WILL URGE A LIGHTER BLOCKADE; Hunt Leaves State Department to Assist Importers From Reich

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 29--Bert L. Hunt, international lawyer and until his resignation yesterday assistant legal adviser of the State Department, has been commissioned by the Committee of American Importers to go to London and Paris
